auth.reset_pass_text_1: Click the link in the {{email}} to create a new password.

instruction.head: Setup guide:
instruction.step_4_1: 4. In response, @BotFather will send your bot's token in the format:
instruction.step_5: 5. Enter the token in the field below

create.name: Name
create.info_text: Here you can add the options: colors, available sizes, and quantity. If you do not specify a color, the default color will be selected; for sizes the default is N/A.
create.quantity_text: To fill in the quantity of each size you need to add the sizes in the section above
create.img_upload_tip: Click "Plus" or drag a file into this field. Maximum – {{number}} image.

analytics.total_visitors_hint: The total number of unique users who have ever clicked "/start"
analytics.start_hint: Number of clicks on the "/start" by all visitors (bot activation or clicking on the product from the link) for whole period
analytics.visits_hint: Total visits to the catalog for whole period
analytics.total_orders_hint: Number of orders placed (including unpaid) for whole period
analytics.paid_orders_hint: Number of orders paid for whole period
analytics.total_sales_hint: Total purchases made for this amount
analytics.conversion_hint: CR, % – the number of purchases divided by the total unique catalog visitors

period_range.new_visitors_hint: The number of new unique users who clicked "/start" in the selected period
period_range.start_hint: The number of clicks on "/start" (bot activation by button or link to the product) for the selected period
period_range.visits_hint: The number of catalog visits for the selected period
period_range.new_orders_hint: Number of placed orders (including unpaid) for the selected period
period_range.paid_orders_hint: The number of paid orders for the selected period
period_range.new_sales_hint: The total amount of purchases done within the selected period
period_range.conversion_hint: CR, % – the number of new purchases divided by the total unique catalog visitors

delivery.delivery_text: This delivery method allows the customer to enter the address where the order should be delivered
delivery.pickup_text: This method allows the customer to select a pickup point from a list of available options. Please add at least 1 pickup point.

instruction_first.head: Payment system connection:
instruction_first.step_1_3: Use the affiliate link to get advantageous connection
instruction_first.step_2: 2. Copy the ShopID from the Settings -> Shop section in YooMoney
instruction_first.step_3: 3. Open the chat with the bot @BotFather on Telegram
instruction_first.step_4: 4. Send the command /mybots and click Payments
instruction_first.step_5: 5. Select YooMoney from the list of payment systems and enter your ShopID
instruction_first.step_6: 6. @BotFather will send you a payment token in the following format: 390540012:LIVE:27425. Specify it in the Payment token field.

instruction_second.head: Payment system connection:
instruction_second.step_3: 3. From the list of payment systems, choose the one that suits you best.
instruction_second.step_4: 4. Open a chat with your chosen payment system and follow the instructions.
instruction_second.step_5: 5. Go back to @BotFather. In connected payment systems, find a token in the format 390540012:LIVE:27425 and enter it in the "Payment token" field on TGShop.

vat_instruction.head: Instructions for setting the VAT rate:
vat_instruction.step_1: 1. In the settings of [Stripe] connect fiscalization
vat_instruction.step_2: 2. Select the VAT rate from the list (by default "Without VAT"), which will be reflected in your receipts.
